<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">
[Efficient Apport](/Spells.aspx?ID=1062)
<actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Teleportation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=156" />
<trait label="Wizard" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=166" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 241 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 60 feet

**Target** 1 unattended object of light Bulk or less
</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

Walking over to an item to pick it up is so much effort. Whether it's your spellbook, a reagent, or a glass of wine, it's simply more efficient to call it to your hand. You teleport the target into your open hand. If you don't have a hand free, it falls to the ground at your feet.

---
**Heightened (3rd)** You can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less

**Heightened (5th)** The range increases to 120 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 1 or less.

**Heightened (7th)** The range increases to 120 feet, and you can target an unattended object with a Bulk of 2 or less.
name: Efficient Apport
